Text:
Calling you out? You serious? It's just that it took me quite some time why I couldn't find those damn mp3s in my player :)

When I did, I realized it was about the tags. 

Huge THANK you for uploading this (and reading the comments) :)

Also, if you could provide an alternative non-Fraunhofer IIS format, and rename the files so the hour number comes before the text (less scrolling on smaller mp3 player screens) that would be appreciated.








No, I'm not serious. :P

Guys I was just kidding around. Please don't take me serious unless I say I'm serious.

Except you barry...hate you for that comment =)
Plus while your at it could you convert these files to FLV for me please Thanks.
I'm only kidding. We luv ya Quazza and we're grateful.
